remarks: Every ` P ` -subgroup is contained in a Sylow ` P ` -subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pgpssslw.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
pgpssslw.2 $e |- S = ( G |`s H ) $.
pgpssslw.3 $e |- F = ( x e. { y e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | ( P pGrp ( G |`s y ) /\ H C_ y ) } |-> ( # ` x ) ) $.
pgpssslw $p |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. Fin /\ P pGrp S ) -> E. k e. ( P pSyl G ) H C_ k ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k x y $.
$d H k x y $.
$d P k x y $.
$d S k x y $.
$d X k x $.
